text: 27|19|atan collaik kelviyurru sulaiman cirittavaraka punnakaip puttar. Melum, â€˜â€˜en iraivane! Ni en mitum, en tay tantai mitum purinta un arulkalukku unakku nan nanri celutta ni enakku arul purivayaka! Unakkut tiruptiyalikkakkutiya narceyalkalaiyum nan ceyya(kkutiya pakkiyattai enakku) arul purintu, un karunaiyaik kontu un nallatiyarkalutanum ennaic certtu vituvayaka!'' Enru pirarttanai ceytar
